entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
